entry: Enter when Fast MACD crosses above Slow MACD and both are above zero.
stop: Hard stop ~0.02 below retracement low; exit if Fast MACD crosses back below Slow.
target: Hold until Fast MACD crosses below Slow; alternatively use measured move TP.
trailing: Exit when Fast MACD crosses back below Slow (dynamic trailing).
notes: Requires MACD indicator (fast/slow). Implement in indicators module or fetch from bridge.
